channel.title: Comments on: What my mom taught me about patience.
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Mom
item.dc:creator: Mom
item.description: I look forward to seeing Evan and his dirty socks this summer. Evan's mom:)

item.title: By: Ben Weinberg

item.description: If I wasn't involved, I probably wished I was. This was very well said.
